coffee.name: Long Black
coffee.description: Our long blacks keep their strength through the sizes - a double espresso for a small, three for a medium and four for a large

coffee.name: Latte
coffee.description: A double espresso with steamed textured milk

coffee.name: Flat White
coffee.description: We're unique in serving flat whites through the sizes. We keep the ratio of coffee:milk the same - a double espresso in small, three for a medium, four for a large.

coffee.name: Filter
coffee.description: Our seasonally sourced, single origin filter coffee, batch brewed freshly.

coffee.name: Cappuccino
coffee.description: A double espresso with steamed and stretched textured milk

coffee.name: Espresso
coffee.description: Our regularly-changing single origin espresso - balanced and sweet.

coffee.name: Piccolo
coffee.description: Stronger than a flat white, 1:2 espresso: textured milk

coffee.name: Espresso Macchiato
coffee.description: Espresso 'marked' with a little textured milk

nonCoffee.name: Hot Chocolate
nonCoffee.description: Hot chocolate and textured steamed milk.

nonCoffee.name: Chai Latte
nonCoffee.description: Chai steamed together with milk for a velvety smooth lightly spiced drink

nonCoffee.name: Darjeeling
nonCoffee.description: From India, this is a first flush Darjeeling tea
